name: yoti/yoti-php-sdk-profile-sandbox-example
description: Yoti PHP SDK Profile Sandbox Example

scripts.copy-sdk: grep -q 'yoti-php-sdk-sandbox' ../../composer.json && rm -fr ./sandbox && cd ../../ && git archive --prefix=sandbox/ --format=tar HEAD | (cd - && tar xf -) || echo 'Could not install Sandbox from parent directory'
